headline: Citigroup Maintains Buy on Martin Marietta Materials, Raises Price Target to $780
summary: Citigroup  analyst Anthony Pettinari   maintains Martin Marietta Materials (NYSE:MLM) with a Buy and raises the price target from $758 to $780.

headline: RBC Capital Maintains Sector Perform on Martin Marietta Materials, Lowers Price Target to $575
summary: RBC Capital  analyst Anthony Codling   maintains Martin Marietta Materials (NYSE:MLM) with a Sector Perform and lowers the price target from $605 to $575.
